description: Retention of play house (in modified form) in rear garden of property
decision_conditions: This permission shall be for a limited period expiring on 8th February 2004 when the structure shall be removed and the land restored to its condition prior to the erection of the playhouse.  REASON:  The playhouse by reason of its siting and material used in its construction, is not considered suitable for permanent retention. | The playhouse hereby permitted shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the property.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties. | The playhouse shall not be used outside the hours of 9am to 7pm on any day.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties. | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans)shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted  REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area. | The tree house shall be modified in accordance with drawings 1-3 dated 01/12/2000 within one month of the grant of planning permission, and thereafter retained.  REASON:  In the interest of living conditions of surrounding residents.
